choices: Still in the little house. (Original Movie/Patch's London Adventure.)
On the Farm. (101 Dalmatians the series era)
1.content: Okay, so you've entered the universe of 101 Dalmatians. Question is, which time period are you in?
1.title: Which Era?

11.content:
Okay. So it's during the time of when Pongo, Perdita and their 99 pups were still living in the house. Moving day is some time from now. But we'll get to more details later.

Now the question is are you male or female?
11.title: Still in the little house.

111.content: Okay, so we know the time setting, and we know you're male. Now have you shown up still human, or do you look like a Dalmatian now?
111.title: Male (Boy/Man)

1111.content: Okay, you're a human male who's shown up during the time Perdita, Pongo, and their pups, all 99 of them are still in the house. How old are you as a human?
1111.title: Still Human.

info.brief_description: You visit the world of 101 Dalmatians. That's a lot of puppies to run into.
info.description:
So, you show up in the animated world of 101 Dalmatians. You can decide if you visit during the time of when Perdita, Pongo, their 99 pups, and their pets lived in the small little house in London, or during the time they moved to the farm out in the country, or perhaps you are visiting during the time period of 101 Dalmatian Street.

Rules to follow:
1. Death of the Main Character or Dalmatian family. (Including Unbirth that regresses them to the point before conception.)
2. No Hard Vore.
3. No Gore.
4. No Digestion of the Main Character or the dalmatian family.
5. No Gay male couples. (Lesbian couples are okay.)
6. No gender swapping characters.
7. No Scat.
8. No Human preds. (Anita and Roger will not partake in voring the main character.)
9. No Watersports
10. No Diapers.
11. No abuse of main character. (I will allow for the grown dogs or puppies to lay on top of the main character, but only in scenarios to cuddle them or keep them warm.
12. No Puppy abuse.
13. No Cum digestion of anyone.
14. No absorption of the main character or Dalmatian family.
15. No making anyone overweight in this story. (I know Rolly is already chubby, so that's an exception, but he is not to add on any more pounds then he already has.
16. No hermaphrodites.
17. No hyper preg, hyper pussy, hyper breasts, hyper cock, hyper anus, etc.
18. No shrinking smaller 6 inches tall.
19. No heavy mention of sex scenes of the parents.
20. No puppy sex scenes. (Dylan and Dolly in 101 Dalmatian Street are exceptions since they're nearing full fledged adults.)
21. No loopholes.

As long as you follow the rules above, you're fine. If you are unsure about a chapter you want to add, feel free to email me, and I'll answer if you are good to go with the story. Have a chapter you want to redo? No sweat. Email me, and I'll delete it so you can start over. If any rules are broken, chapter will be deleted. If the same person continues to post the same chapter after I delete it, I will block that user from the story.

Be aware, the rules may be subject to change, so please be attentive when entering new chapters to the story. Other than that, have fun with adding to the interactive.
